message.say: how can the functioning of the pancreas cause diabetes? Jordan I think this can help your grandparents.

message.name: A146
message.say: The pancreas causes diabetes in the fact that is does not make enough insulin. Although with diabetes, your body does not move sugar or does not respond to insulin normally, the pancreas is responsible to making insulin so the correct answer is that it does not make enough insulin.
